Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT VALUE(max(CHAR(timestamp))'')
FROM seguros.sini_lot_abat02
 
where cod_lot_fenal          =  :COD_LOT_FENAL
  and num_Apolice            =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and cod_cobertura          =  :COD_COBERTURA
  and cod_retencao           =  :COD_RETENCAO
  and num_parcela            =  :NUM_PARCELA
  and NUM_aPOL_SINISTRO     <>  :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  and tipo_parcela           =  :TIPO_PARCELA
  and timestamp             <=  current timestamp
/
 END SQL
